flm_File* flm_FileNew ( int  fd)
flm_File* flm_FileOpen ( const char *  root,
const char *  path,
const char *  mode 
)

Open a file.

See fopen(3) for further explanations about the parameters.

Parameters:
pathA path to a file in the file system.
flagsFile flags as described in fopen(3).
Returns:
A pointer to a new flm_file obj.
Return values:
NULLin case of error, usually when there is no more memory available or you cannot access to the file.
